      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_66526ee34e6a5b42cc08f292c17ede37006ca01a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_66526ee34e6a5b42cc08f292c17ede37006ca01a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The relationship of pivot point and amount of force in a force lift</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Verhältnis des Gelenkpunktes und -stärke in 
einem Kraftheber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le rapport du point et de la force de pivot dans 
un ascenseur de force</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O relacionamento do ponto do pivô e da quantidade
de força em um elevador da força</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il rapporto del punto e della forza del perno in 
un elevatore della forza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σχέση του σημείου άξονα και του ποσού δύναμης σε 
έναν ανελκυστήρα δύναμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El lazo de la punta y de la fuerza del pivote en 
una elevación de la fuerza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three force lifts with different pivot points. The length of the arrow corresponds to the amount of force needed to lift the heavy sack.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sack</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Kraftheber mit 
unterschiedlichen Gelenkpunkten. Die Länge des Pfeiles 
entspricht der Stärke, die benötigt wird, um den schweren Sack 
anzuheben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois ascenseurs de 
force avec différents points de pivot. La longueur de la 
flèche correspond à la force requise pour soulever le sac lourd.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três elevadores da 
força com pontos diferentes do pivô. O comprimento da seta 
corresponde à quantidade de força necessitada levantar o sack 
pesado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre elevatori della 
forza con differenti punti del perno. La lunghezza della freccia
corrisponde alla forza stata necessaria per alzare il sacco pesante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρεις ανελκυστήρες 
δύναμης με τα διαφορετικά σημεία άξονα. Το μήκος του 
βέλους αντιστοιχεί στο ποσό δύναμης που απαιτείται για να 
ανυψώσει το βαρύ σάκο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres elevaciones de la 
fuerza con diversas puntas del pivote. La longitud de la flecha 
corresponde a la fuerza necesitada para levantar el saco pesado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gelenkpunkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sack</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">drehenkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">point de pivot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sac</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ponto do pivô</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sack</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força de giro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">punto del perno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sacco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza di rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημείο άξονα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σάκος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γυρίζοντας δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">punta del pivote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">saco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza que da vuelta</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
